name: Zombie Knight
languages: understands one language but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the creature is grappled if its Medium or smaller (escape DC 13)  and until the grapple ends  the zombie can't grab another target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by a zombie. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage  and the zombie regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points by damage that isnt radiant or from a critical hit, its instead reduced to 1 hit point, falls prone, and is stunned until the end of its next turn, appearing to be dead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A zombie doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
